content.p: Promoting interdisciplinary research collaborations to improve health and wellbeing. Our interdisciplinary research brings together researchers from across the University and external organisations to tackle, more effectively, some of the most important challenges in improving well-being and health in contemporary society. We draw on the key aspects of contemporary society, which includes increased human interconnection, technological innovation, and anthropological/ecological transformation. About our research How the IRC can help early career researchers: a case study
